title.@value: Schizophrenia, multiple episodes, in partial remission

definition.@value: All definitional requirements for Schizophrenia, multiple episodes in terms of symptoms and duration were previously met. Symptoms have ameliorated such that the diagnostic requirements for the disorder have not been met for at least one month, but some clinically significant symptoms remain, which may or may not be associated with functional impairment. The partial remission may have occurred in response to medication or other treatment.

fullySpecifiedName.@value: Schizophrenia, multiple episodes, currently in partial remission

label.@value: Schizophrenia, multiple episodes, in partial remission
Schizophrenia, multiple episodes, currently in partial remission
